name: ShipmatcH FREE
description:
ShipmatcH, the futuristic flight combat simulator, has returned with more challenges, more ships, and more fun! Pilot your way to victory in this free taste of what ShipmatcH has to offer.

THE FULL VERSION OF SHIPMATCH IS AVAILABLE NOW!

ShipmatcH FREE features:
- Four vibrant 3D cities
- Two different ships with two weapons each
- Fully customisable touch and tilt controls
- Simple training to get you flying like a pro in minutes
- 2-player competitive wireless multiplayer mode

This free version also contains skippable advertisements to show you the great features available in the full version.
